snippet.title: [DJMAX RAY] - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
DJMAX RAY
Coming Soon in Fall
for iOS Devices
Requires iOS 4.3+
iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5/iPad 1, 2, new iPad/iPod Touch 4th Generation+

Short summary: Tap Sonic DJMAX Edition
Looks like there's going to be some old DJMAX Online songs like Phoenix Virus.
Also, did anyone noticed that awkward CREDITS text on the title screen? (as if this was made for the arcade?) Unless that means staff credits....

My Thoughts
Disappointing. Well, to be more generous, it is somewhat different from Tap Sonic, but still, the basic gameplay is exactly same as a Tap Sonic. Even the interface didn't changed. You might as well just call it Tap Sonic 2. Also, notice that "YOU NEED TO CLEAR THE CHALLENGES TO UNLOCK NEW SONGS". Looks like another type of (stupid) challenge system is waiting for us.
In positive side, I like how they added more custom items, not only on notes and gear but also on the note effects (or call it CoolBomb). Also they seems to be adding old classic DJMAX Online songs for people who missed those songs.
Looks like this will be released as a 'freemium' game. I mean, come on. No one likes that stupid points system that costs you money everytime you play. Just release this game for full price and make it better.
Or even ACTUAL support for some devices. What about the iPads? I can't imagine new iPad users looking at terribly pixelated game on the Retina Display. What about the new iPhone 5 and iPod Touch? Feel like Pentavision is getting really lazy nowadays.
